alert.note: Alert for Custer; El Paso; Fremont; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 12:58PM MDT until June 12 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Fremont County in central Colorado... Northeastern Custer County in southeastern Colorado... South central El Paso County in east central Colorado... Northwestern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 200 PM MDT. * At 1257 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Florence, or 20 miles north of Junkins Burn Scar, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This storm has a history of producing 1 inch hail as it moved over Canon City. * Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Florence, Pueblo Reservoir, Penrose, Pueblo West, Pinon, Canon City and Wetmore. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
